rows.label: qst701601_msg0001
rows.name:
Aw, come on. I'm begging you! Just
a small taste of one of your culinary
masterpieces is all I'm asking!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0002
rows.name:
My dear Mr. Maulton. You can keep
on begging till the Ardun come home,
but it's not going to change anything...

rows.label: qst701601_msg0003
rows.name:
Ach, come on, lass!
I told you why I'm here.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0004
rows.name:
I came all the bleedin' way from
Superbia to partake in your fine
food!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0005
rows.name:
I can't possibly go home without
sampling Iira's most closely
guarded secret!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm even risking my neck being here,
for God's sakes!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0007
rows.name:
Go on, make an exception just this
one time. For me.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0008
rows.name:
As I've mentioned numerous times,
Mr. Maulton, it simply can't be done.
I'm sorry...

rows.label: qst701601_msg0009
rows.name:
Sorry to interrupt, but what is it
exactly that's stopping you?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0010
rows.name: Oh! Laura, Prince Adel...

rows.label: qst701601_msg0011
rows.name:
It's because of my parents. I left
them in Porton Village and now
they're... They've...passed on.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0012
rows.name:
I've been trying to get over the grief,
but I just can't... I... I'm barely keeping
it together as it is...

rows.label: qst701601_msg0013
rows.name:
Oh, that's rough. My deepest
condolences.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0014
rows.name:
Even so, you simply cannot continue to
serve meals with such a sub-par taste!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0015
rows.name:
Sub-par it may be, but tell me,
Mr. Maulton, how is it in relation
to Superbian cuisine?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0016
rows.name: ...All right, you win that one.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0017
rows.name:
Is Superbian cuisine really that bad,
Hugo?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0018
rows.name: Ah, er, well... It's an acquired taste.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0019
rows.name:
I would have to say I'm quite fond
of our delicacies, but it seems that
the public opinion differs.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0020
rows.name:
I can't really stomach it I'm afraid.
I'd take Shin's cooking over it any day.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0021
rows.name: Obviously.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0022
rows.name: It is obvious, is it...?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0023
rows.name:
Look, I know it sounds selfish of me
to insist, but how long are you going
to keep this up, eh?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0024
rows.name:
These customers are coming to you.
They know how good you are, but look
at what you're serving them!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0025
rows.name:
Everyone has to deal with hardships,
you more than others. But a good chef
prides themselves on their food!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0026
rows.name: Yes, but...

rows.label: qst701601_msg0027
rows.name: I've got it!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0028
rows.name:
I know this might be hard on you,
ma'am, but I may have a way to add
a little zest to your cooking.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0029
rows.name: Zest?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0030
rows.name: By way of a cooking contest!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0031
rows.name: Yes! Give that man a medal!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0032
rows.name:
I'll happily front the reward money.
And I'm sure we can borrow the inn
for an evening if we ask nicely.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0033
rows.name:
So it's to be an evening with
Adel, is it?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0034
rows.name:
Well, let's not put that on the
pamphlets.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0035
rows.name:
But moving on, Hugo and I could be
the judges. And let's see...

rows.label: qst701601_msg0036
rows.name:
Sign me up too. I came here to sample
food. This may turn out be the perfect
opportunity for me.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0037
rows.name: Done!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0038
rows.name:
But is there anyone who would even
want to participate in a food contest
in times this dangerous...?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0039
rows.name: Absolutely!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0040
rows.name:
Don't let his looks fool you. Shin here
happen to be a very talented cook!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0041
rows.name: Me? Oh no, I'm...

rows.label: qst701601_msg0042
rows.name: Come on Shin. Help them out here.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0043
rows.name:
You'll be doing everyone a huge favor.
And I really want to see you put your
skills to the test!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0045
rows.name: ...Very well, then.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0046
rows.name: That's our Shin

rows.label: qst701601_msg0047
rows.name:
Next, we'll have to ask around the
capital and see who else might be
interested in taking part.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0048
rows.name: Will you be joining us, Kozel-san?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0051
rows.name: I suppose.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0052
rows.name:
I am quite curious to see the extent
of the Paragon of Iira's skills with
a ladle and spatula.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0053
rows.name: This is getting rather exciting!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0054
rows.name: Hey, hold up a sec...

rows.label: qst701601_msg0055
rows.name: Yes, Hikari?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0056
rows.name: Aren't we forgetting someone here?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0057
rows.name: Oh, you must mean Aegaeon?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0058
rows.name:
Hey, you're right! Wadatsumi can make
a mean fish pie! We'll have to see if
we can get him on board, and.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0059
rows.name: Not him! ME!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0060
rows.name: You better watch out Shin.

rows.label: qst701601_msg0061
rows.name:
'Cause I'm gonna sneak up and steal
that victory from right under your nose!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0062
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: qst701601_msg0063
rows.name:
Hey, watch it! You'll be laughing on
the other side of your face!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0064
rows.name:
I'm serious, and I'll be bringing my
A-game!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0065
rows.name:
Well, now that we have some
real challengers...

rows.label: qst701601_msg0066
rows.name:
Why don't we return to the inn and
talk this through?

rows.label: qst701601_msg0067
rows.name: Fine by me!

rows.label: qst701601_msg0068
rows.name:
Ho-ho... This is shaping up to be even
better than I'd imagined!
